synopsis.text: Yuno Gasai seems to have it all - loving parents, good friends, and a happy life as a high school student. Yet she can't shake the feeling that someone important is missing. After a fun class trip to the beach, Yuno returns home only to receive strange messages from a mysterious voice. It tells her of a forgotten beloved she is desperate to reunite with. Before long, Yuno finds herself on an astonishing journey to uncover lost memories and rediscover the person she holds most dear. Though the path poses daunting obstacles, she persists undaunted. For when it comes to meeting her cherished one again, Yuno will let nothing stand in her way.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
